sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Execution of Suspicious File Type Extension
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an ".exe" (or other known executable extension) file. This can be caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process.
This rule might require some initial baselining to align with some third party tooling in the user environment.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Python Image Load By Non-Python Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the image load of "Python Core" by a non-Python process. This might be indicative of a Python script bundled with Py2Exe.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Patrick St. John, OTR (Open Threat Research)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the Setting of Windows Defender Exclusions
Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe" ; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath @($env:UserProfile, $env:ProgramData) -ExclusionExtension '.exe' -Force; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\ProgramData\Google\Chrome\updater.exe; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath @($env:UserProfile, $env:ProgramData) -ExclusionExtension '.exe' -Force; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\ProgramData\Google\Chrome\updater.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects when an attacker tries to disable User Account Control (UAC) by changing its registry key HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System\EnableLUA from 1 to 0
Detects when an attacker tries to disable User Account Control (UAC) by setting the registry value "EnableLUA" to 0.
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects script file execution (.js, .jse, .vba, .vbe, .vbs, .wsf) by Wscript/Cscript
Detects an uncommon svchost parent process

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=svchost.exe; Hashes=SHA1=2A219EADB234EB09A9EDE1594D68DA0F294287BA,MD5=D2CBFEB7C4619A898890FEB4C4514AA9,SHA256=59F4D42056BC43960C2B052FA9D615AD6E654C8AA1DFE3703342375523BA8EA5,IMPHASH=41721E0F933696D50AB32D544D64DCD3; Description=Host Process for Windows Services; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1276 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\ProgramData\Google\GoogleData.exe; CommandLine=svchost.exe; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\ProgramData\Google\GoogleData.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\svchost.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of Python DLL files.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential Persistence Attempt Via Run Keys Using Reg.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious command line reg.exe tool adding key to RUN key in Registry

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Hashes=SHA1=3CE71813199ABAE99348F61F0CAA34E2574F831C,MD5=4E2ACF4F8A396486AB4268C94A6A245F,SHA256=9A7C58BD98D70631AA1473F7B57B426DB367D72429A5455B433A05EE251F3236,IMPHASH=8542FB14699D84D7E8DA92F66145C7FE; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scandlls.exe" ; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c "reg add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run /v empyrean /t REG_SZ /d C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\empyrean\run.bat /f"; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scandlls.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=04CE0B79EA20332CC4FF4679883B18BFE4341FBD,MD5=E3DACF0B31841FA02064B4457D44B357,SHA256=928693D84D652DC15B3FCDC6576D790053755C5181CE6708B1110DE12ADAE4A1,IMPHASH=BE482BE427FE212CFEF2CDA0E61F19AC; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=reg.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Registry Console Tool; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c "reg add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run /v empyrean /t REG_SZ /d C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\empyrean\run.bat /f"; CommandLine=reg  add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run /v empyrean /t REG_SZ /d C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\empyrean\run.bat /f; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\reg.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions
Detects the execution of WMIC with the "csproduct" which is used to obtain information such as hardware models and vendor information

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=BF0B46AE28A0DCCC62CF1F3C32B60A46EA928C52,MD5=EC80E603E0090B3AC3C1234C2BA43A0F,SHA256=D368BCB7934DB0C53D1E7277DCB47AF2B709253CBF0EEE9869EE7E17ED226EA3,IMPHASH=59A9108CA1CECC9147C5FBAB104EBF33; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=wmic.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=WMI Commandline Utility; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c "C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe csproduct get uuid"; CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe  csproduct get uuid; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\empyrean\; OriginalFileName=wmic.exe; Hashes=SHA1=BF0B46AE28A0DCCC62CF1F3C32B60A46EA928C52,MD5=EC80E603E0090B3AC3C1234C2BA43A0F,SHA256=D368BCB7934DB0C53D1E7277DCB47AF2B709253CBF0EEE9869EE7E17ED226EA3,IMPHASH=59A9108CA1CECC9147C5FBAB104EBF33; Description=WMI Commandline Utility; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c "C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe csproduct get uuid"; CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe  csproduct get uuid; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=Medium; Image=C:\Windows\System32\wbem\WMIC.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Schtasks Schedule Type With High Privileges
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects scheduled task creations or modification to be run with high privileges on a suspicious schedule type

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=SHA1=815A050FC4BD12C6CA0B62D38D0FB6F8A95F70A8,MD5=838D346D1D28F00783B7A6C6BD03A0DA,SHA256=8BE433049CCC271F04A8E625E9FB9BD3BCF15B4EDEB63497C00BD9CE1CD5C50E,IMPHASH=7EE4BC5589713B3470B8A950256E2E69; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" /c schtasks /create /f /sc onlogon /rl highest /tn "WinUpdater" /tr '"C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\WinUpdater.exe"' & exit; CommandLine=schtasks  /create /f /sc onlogon /rl highest /tn "WinUpdater" /tr '"C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\WinUpdater.exe"' ; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious process starts on Windows systems based on keywords
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe" ; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath @($env:UserProfile, $env:ProgramData) -ExclusionExtension '.exe' -Force; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\ProgramData\Google\Chrome\updater.exe; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath @($env:UserProfile, $env:ProgramData) -ExclusionExtension '.exe' -Force; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\ProgramData\Google\Chrome\updater.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=815A050FC4BD12C6CA0B62D38D0FB6F8A95F70A8,MD5=838D346D1D28F00783B7A6C6BD03A0DA,SHA256=8BE433049CCC271F04A8E625E9FB9BD3BCF15B4EDEB63497C00BD9CE1CD5C50E,IMPHASH=7EE4BC5589713B3470B8A950256E2E69; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" /c schtasks /create /f /sc onlogon /rl highest /tn "WinUpdater" /tr '"C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\WinUpdater.exe"' & exit; CommandLine=schtasks  /create /f /sc onlogon /rl highest /tn "WinUpdater" /tr '"C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\WinUpdater.exe"' ; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
When C# is compiled dynamically, a .cmdline file will be created as a part of the process.
Certain processes are not typically observed compiling C# code, but can do so without touching disk.
This can be used to unpack a payload for execution
Detects the creation of a new service using the "sc.exe" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=72785E3068AA52CA223DA466595D3863AB6507AB,MD5=D79784553A9410D15E04766AAAB77CD6,SHA256=AEB241959F4A7B7C29F45D27FD65C5326F9592D25BADD1A7659DE0DA351BF96E,IMPHASH=7D296975925315BE8D57D0C67B133359; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32; OriginalFileName=sc.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Service Control Manager Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe" ; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\sc.exe create "GoogleUpdateTaskMachineQC" binpath= "C:\ProgramData\Google\Chrome\updater.exe" start= "auto"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\Scan.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\sc.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the stopping of a Windows service via the "sc.exe" utility
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Jakob Weinzettl, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of the redirection character ">" to redicrect information in commandline

match_context.values: @{EventID=1; Image=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /create /f /sc onlogon /rl highest /tn WinUpdater /tr "C:\\Users\\<USER>\\AppData\\Roaming\\WinUpdater.exe" & exit}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: WMI Module Loaded By Non Uncommon Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a WMI modules being loaded by an uncommon process
